objects.specification: The floor is a broad rectangular surface composed of light-toned wooden planks with a subtle grain texture and a smooth matte finish, evoking a warm and airy atmosphere in the classroom.

This wall is a vertical planar surface with a smooth plaster finish painted in a soft off-white color. It has crisp straight edges and a uniform texture, providing a clean backdrop for mounting fixtures.

This wall is a vertical planar surface with a smooth plaster finish painted in a soft off-white color. It has crisp straight edges and a uniform texture, providing a clean backdrop for mounting fixtures.

This wall is a vertical planar surface with a smooth plaster finish painted in a soft off-white color. It has crisp straight edges and a uniform texture, providing a clean backdrop for mounting fixtures.

This wall is a vertical planar surface with a smooth plaster finish painted in a soft off-white color. It has crisp straight edges and a uniform texture, providing a clean backdrop for mounting fixtures.
A single-panel wooden door with a rich warm wood grain finish, featuring subtle recessed rectangular panel details, a matte protective coating, and a sleek brushed nickel handle.
A rectangular window comprised of clear tempered glass panes set within a slender painted metal frame in a light complementary hue, offering a clean, transparent view with subtle mullions.
A pair of fabric drapes in a muted complementary color, with soft folds and gentle pleats in a realistic drape, hung from a discreet rod to add warmth and texture.
A large rectangular desk crafted from dark-stained wood with a subtle grain pattern, featuring rounded edges, a polished surface, and sturdy tapered legs conveying professional elegance.
An executive-style chair constructed from dark-stained wood matching the desk, with a high backrest and cushioned seat upholstered in a complementary fabric, supported by gently curved armrests.
A horizontal rectangular whiteboard with a slim anodized aluminum frame and a glossy white writing surface, equipped with rounded corners for a sleek modern presentation area.
A minimalistic ceiling-mounted light fixture with a flat, circular profile and frosted diffuser, finished in matte white for uniform, soft overhead illumination.
A minimalistic ceiling-mounted light fixture with a flat, circular profile and frosted diffuser, finished in matte white for uniform, soft overhead illumination.
A compact ceiling-mounted projector in an off-white plastic housing with rounded edges, featuring a central lens aperture, subtle ventilation grilles, and discreet mounting hardware.
A tall, open-front bookshelf made of medium-toned wood with a natural matte finish, featuring multiple evenly spaced shelves filled with neatly arranged colorful books.
A circular wall clock with a thin metal rim in a dark finish, a clean white face with clear numeric hour markers, and slender contrasting hands for a minimalist design.
A potted indoor plant with lush green foliage of elongated leaves arranged around central stems, placed in a simple cylindrical ceramic pot with a smooth, neutral matte surface.
A small cylindrical waste bin made of durable plastic in a neutral gray tone, with a smooth matte exterior and a slightly tapered body for a clean utilitarian look.
A small cylindrical waste bin made of durable plastic in a neutral gray tone, with a smooth matte exterior and a slightly tapered body for a clean utilitarian look.
An educational poster printed on matte paper with vivid illustrations and clear informational graphics, framed by a slim border and protected by a subtle lamination sheen.
An educational poster printed on matte paper with vivid illustrations and clear informational graphics, framed by a slim border and protected by a subtle lamination sheen.

A student desk consisting of a rectangular tabletop made from light-toned wood with visible grain and a smooth matte finish, supported by slender metal legs painted in a soft complementary color, with rounded edges for safety.

A student chair featuring a wooden seat and backrest in matching light wood tone, mounted on a slender metal frame in a complementary finish, with a simple ergonomic form and protective matte coating.
